description: This group of tables stores information about the override that a clinician entered when they chose to not use the products chosen by outpatient Intelligent Medication System (IMS). This table stores the IMS suggested dose for the products that were overridden, found in the OPIMS Overridden Suggested Dose (I ORD 11604) item.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: COMPONENT_DOSE
columns.description: Stores the dose of the products that Intelligent Medication Selection (IMS) suggested
